ACCOUNTANT
Professional Summary
I am an enthusiastic, honest, dedicated and professional individual who has integrity and an ambition to succeed in any given environment.
Although I have extensive experience in the Medical Billing and Accounting industries, I also have experience in many other areas and I am always up to a challenge whatever the situation.
I work well with others, as well as on my own.
I am seeking a career where I can develop and excel while exceeding both personal and professional goals.

Accounting operations professional Financial reporting specialist QuickBooks proficient Certified Billing / Coding Specialist Strong communication skills Superior attention to detail Account reconciliation specialist Self-motivated professional AR/AP Account reconciliation
Customer relations Analytical reasoning Exceptional organization Strong in MS Access and Excel Physician billing CMS-1500 billing forms HIPAA compliance International Classification of Diseases (ICD.9CM) Medical bill auditing

<JD_START>
Job Title: Accounting Specialist

Location: Austin, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Accounting/Auditing, Finance

Description:
Overview

HealthSure, an Alera Group Company, is looking to add an Accounting Specialist to our team!

HealthSure is a risk consulting and insurance agency focused solely on the rural healthcare community. No competitor focuses 100% on rural healthcare. Our insight fuels a passion for finding ways to deliver service and value that others won’t and can’t.

Because we believe people living in rural communities deserve the best possible health care, our purpose is to ensure the people, services, and facilities they depend upon are protected from risk and empowered to thrive.

Our motto, “Never Go It Alone”, describes our commitment to encouraging and facilitating collaboration among rural healthcare leaders who share our purpose.

This position performs the accounting functions of the agency. The Accounting Specialist is responsible for all receivables and payables, month-end processes, Epic support (entry of carriers, vendors, and brokers), and ensuring completion of all tasks in a timely manner and to the HealthSure quality standards. They may also be tasked with developing new accounting procedures and policies.

Responsibilities

Agency contact for payroll and audits payroll checklist every two weeksBank reconcilationsBi-Weekly payroll and benefit entries in EpicReconciles and enters all direct bill importsManages all receivables and payablesMaintains expense dashbaordsMonthly Producer and Account Executive production statementsMonthly reconciliation and entry of corporate credit cardsReconcile profit centers each month (MCDC, CHIC Program, Leaf Health, Virgin Pulse)Reconcile End of Month reports (Aged AR, Expiration Lists, Exclusion Reports)Complete quarterly staff bonus sheets and annual compensation sheetsComplete HealthSure’s annual Workers’ Compensation auditEnters annual budget into management systemDocuments and follows accounting procedures and controls in accordance with Generally Accepted Accounting Procedures utilizing the agency’s MIS system, Applied Systems™Other duties may be assigned

Qualifications

10 years of accounting experience4 years of agency account experienceProficiency using Microsoft Office (Word/Excel) and ability to utilize computer programs and understand functionality Excellent written and oral communication skillsExceptional organizational skills, problem-solving and decision-making abilities, detail orientationAbove average analytical skillsAbility to multi-taskThe desire and willingness to continue to grow and learnIntegrity, drive, ambition and a positive attitude

Benefits

We offer comprehensive benefits to employees, including medical, dental, STD, LTD and life insurance, 401k, paid time off and much more.

We're an equal opportunity employer. All applicants will be considered for employment without attention to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, veteran or disability status.

If you're a California resident, please read the California Consumer Privacy Act prior to applying.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
